biotools.summary: The NASSAM webserver searches for 3D patterns in nucleic acid structures. Motifs and formations of nucleic acid bases in 3D space within nucleic acid PDB formatted structures. The searches are based on distances between the bases which are represented as pseudoatom vectors. This search is independent of the base sequence order.

bioschemas.name: NASSAM
